alert.note: Alert for Chase; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 12:55AM CDT until June 27 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Northern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 100 AM MDT. * At 1155 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sixteen-Mile Corner, or 10 miles southeast of Julesburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Imperial, Grant, Madrid, Venango, Elsie, Wild Horse Spring, Brandon and Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 41 and 77. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
